id: foodbabe--2020-06-29--Get a list of EVERYTHING in my pantry, fridge and freezer! (All Food Babe approved of course)
title: Get a list of EVERYTHING in my pantry, fridge and freezer! (All Food Babe approved of course)
content:
My dreams are coming true and I ’ m not just talking about my family expanding – if you didn ’ t hear the news , I am pregnant 😀 The dream of creating a cookbook of all my favorite recipes and everything I make for Mr. Food Babe and my daughter Harley is also coming true .
My first cookbook , Food Babe Kitchen , hits shelves in October and I ’ m so thankful for all of you who are as excited as I am… And as a giant THANK YOU for pre-ordering a copy of my cookbook @ @ @ @ @ @ @ for you .
I put together a list of all the food brands , staples and specialty products I stock in my kitchen for you : It includes EVERYTHING you ’ d find if you went to my house and raided my pantry and fridge !
This will help you get your kitchen stocked for success so that as soon as you receive Food Babe Kitchen in your hot little hands , you ’ ll be ready to get cooking .
Get your bonus now by following these steps : • Check your @ @ @ @ @ @ @ • Click the confirmation link to access the pantry list .
Available in stores everywhere October 20th , 2020 If you have any questions , feel free to ask in the comments below .
There are more bonus goodies to come if you order your book early , so stay tuned for details !
author: Food Babe
